Description.Text:
Position The Hotel Antico Borgo is situated in the romantic centre of Riva del Garda, in a pedestrian area and just a few steps from the lake shores and only 30km from Trento.
Restaurant The elegant restaurant offers a top level service: guests can choose between bed and breakfast or half board arrangement. In the latter case, dinner is served at the table and drinks are not included.
More Informations The hotel has a living room with bar, a tv room and a beautiful terrace with solarium and fitness corner. Wi-Fi connection in the hall also available. Moreover, not far from the hotel, guests will find a parking the hotel has a special agreement for. Opening hours: 24h Check-in: 17.00 Check-out: 10.00
